price: اور حق کو باطل کے ساتھ خَلط مَلط نہ کرو اور نہ حق کو چھپاؤ، تمہیں تو خود اس کا علم ہے۔
arabic: وَلَا تَلۡبِسُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ وَتَكۡتُمُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَأَنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Urdu Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Urdu by Muhammad Ibrahim Gunakry. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā talbisū al-ḥaqa bil-bāṭili wataktumū al-ḥaqa wa-antum taʿlamūna
